content.raw:
Done! I created a very ugly cube with Blender and attached two skeletons to it, exported to collada and wrote a test to make sure the cube root name is correct \(and not dummy\).

Test fails with the custom\_paths\_uri branch but succeeds with this branch, as well as the model is spawned correctly in simulation with this patch but returns an error for duplicated bones without.

I’m really not happy with my CMake work, if you think there is a better way to include the graphics path and link to it feel free to update the PR!
content.html:
Done! I created a very ugly cube with Blender and attached two skeletons to it, exported to collada and wrote a test to make sure the cube root name is correct (and not dummy).

Test fails with the custom_paths_uri branch but succeeds with this branch, as well as the model is spawned correctly in simulation with this patch but returns an error for duplicated bones without.

I’m really not happy with my CMake work, if you think there is a better way to include the graphics path and link to it feel free to update the PR!
